data.actual_result: The item is not able to be dragged below the last item.
data.expected_result: The item can be dragged below the last item.
data.short_description: Items cannot be moved below the last item in channel sort.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings. - Go to Channels. - Tap Sort on the top right. - Choose any option. - Scroll all the way to the bottom and attempt to drag any item below the last item.
